items.content_html: Fullstack web application created with ReactJS on the front-end, Java Spring Boot on the back-end and using H2 database. Lightweight application meant to showcase the use of CRUD operations from web interface created by ReactJS all the way to database with the help of Java Spring Boot.

Lightweight application meant to showcase the use of CRUD operations from web interface created by ReactJS all the way to database with the help of Java Spring Boot.

items.content_html: Telegramsjs - is a lightweight Node.js library for creating Telegram bots. It is designed to be a framework and does not rely on third-party libraries such as Telegraf.js or node-telegram-bot-api. This library provides a way to create Telegram bots with ease and flexibility.
items.title: telegramsjs/Telegramsjs: Telegramsjs - is a lightweight Node.js library for creating Telegram bots. It is designed to be a framework and does not rely on third-party libraries such as Telegraf.js or node-telegram-bot-api. This library provides a way to create Telegram bots with ease and flexibility.

items.content_html: Super lightweight typescript function to convert hexes of format #RRGGBB to rgb of value rgb(x,y,z) or rgba(x,y,z,a).
items.title: flofehrenbacher/hex-2-rgb: Super lightweight typescript function to convert hexes of format #RRGGBB to rgb of value rgb(x,y,z) or rgba(x,y,z,a).

items.content_html: A lightweight Node.js utility to detect if a website is running on WordPress. The package supports both CommonJS and ES6 module systems, allowing easy integration in a wide range of projects. It includes functions to validate URLs and check for WordPress-specific markers in a website's HTML content.
items.title: hassan-sh/wordpress-detect: A lightweight Node.js utility to detect if a website is running on WordPress. The package supports both CommonJS and ES6 module systems, allowing easy integration in a wide range of projects. It includes functions to validate URLs and check for WordPress-specific markers in a website's HTML content.

items.content_html: ‚åöüçáA lightweight Object-Relational Mapping (ORM) library designed for use with React Native and SQLite databases. It provides a seamless way to interact with SQLite databases, offering a simple and type-safe API for managing database operations within your React Native applications.
items.title: CrispenGari/reactite: ‚åöüçáA lightweight Object-Relational Mapping (ORM) library designed for use with React Native and SQLite databases. It provides a seamless way to interact with SQLite databases, offering a simple and type-safe API for managing database operations within your React Native applications.
